# cook your code here
n = int(raw_input())
for i in range(n):
    l=raw_input().split()
    s = l[0]
    sub = l[1]
    flag = 0
    for j in range(6):
        for k in range(5):
            if(s[j+k]==sub[k]):
                if k==4:
                    flag=1
            else:
                break
        if flag==1:
            break
    if flag==1:
        print 1
    else:
        print 0
